title: Earning Avios and Elite Points For each flight flown with Iberia you will be able to obtain: - Avios, currency that you accumulate in your Iberia Plus balance which allows you to redeem for flights and other opportunities offered by Iberia Plus programme. - Elite Points, currency that is obtained exclusively on flights and is used to maintain or upgrade to elite card levels. Specific information about Avios earning and the number of Elite Points to be earned with your ticket is shown during the purchasing process at iberia.com.
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {4783=Air Nostrum was born in 1994 with the clear vocation of being the main regional airline in the South of Europe. Today, Air Nostrum feeds the Iberia Groups long and medium haul routes with more than 120 direct links with origin or destination to nearly 60 airports in 12 countries of Europe and North Africa. By number of movements and volume of routes, Air Nostrum is one of the main operators in the corridor Spain-France and Spain-Italy. In addition to designing a network aimed at offering more efficient capillarity to the Iberia Group, in Air Nostrums DNA there has always been the mission of uniting territories developing low and medium density routes in market niches and peripheral regions. In this way, Air Nostrum flies to 14 Spanish autonomous communities and the Autonomous City of Melilla and is the sole operator of scheduled flights at 3 airports of the AENA network as well as the main airline in another 10. During these twenty years, Air Nostrum has carried more than 65 million passengers in nearly 2 million flights and has received the prize to the best European regional company on five occasions, granted by the European Regional Airlines Association (ERA), as well as the award for the best regional company in the world, awarded by Air Transport World magazine (2011).}
textBeforeTable: EARNING AVIOS (FOR EACH FLIGHT) - From March 1st 2015 Specific information about Avios earning and the number of Elite Points to be earned with your ticket is shown during the purchasing process at iberia.com. - Elite Points, currency that is obtained exclusively on flights and is used to maintain or upgrade to elite card levels. - Avios, currency that you accumulate in your Iberia Plus balance which allows you to redeem for flights and other opportunities offered by Iberia Plus programme. Earning Avios and Elite Points For each flight flown with Iberia you will be able to obtain: Iberia Regional Air Nostrum var txtCerrar = 'Close ';
textAfterTable: * Minimum Avios are the guaranteed Avios amounts you get according to the booking class for less than 500 air-miles flights. Earning Avios on direct flights operated with IB code (operated by Iberia Group or other companies associated to Iberia Plus programme) is related to these criteria:  - Real distance flown based on miles and flight class (cabin bonus)  - Card level (Platinum, Gold and Silver bonus)  EXCEPTIONS: - Please, check routes and class restrictions on flights with code IB operated by other companies on each company tables.  PLATINUM, GOLD AND SILVER BONUS - From April 1st 2015 The elite Bonus is an additional number of Avios that Platinum, Gold and Silver cardholders obtain.  With Platinum, Gold and Silver Bonus you will obtain Avios extra, depending on the card level, in all flights operated by Iberia Regional with an IB code. Bonuses for elite card customers will be: - Platinum Card: 100% - Gold Card: 50%  - Silver Card: 25% The Elite Bonus is calculated based on the real distance flown for Economy Flexible fares and higher fares (Premium Economy, Business and First Class), and based on the actual Avios accrued for Economy Classic and Economy Basic fares. When the distance flown is less than 500 miles, the bonus percentage will be calculated based on 500 miles for
